Summary of my experience: 1.200 hours of shameless tunneling from Russian tryhards, disgusting face-camping from Bubbas or console survivors who walk onto walls and teleport.

This game has common things with League.Most importantly the ban system.Both games pretend to have one.And they're very addictive...Now it's too late for me to quit this game, i'm doomed to suffer in it's maps.

Buy it. :)
